bibl.title: The Brill Dictionary of Ancient Greek. Editors of the English Edition: Madeleine Goh & Chad Schroeder, under the auspices of the Center for Hellenic Studies, Washington D.C. Advisory Editors: Gregory Nagy & Leonard Muellner.
bibl.note: English translation of: Vocabolario della lingua greca. Con la collaborazione di Ivan Garofalo & Daniela Manetti. Fondato su un progetto di Nino Marinone. 3a edizione (Torino, 2013).
bibl.seg: Franco Montanari, The Brill Dictionary of Ancient Greek. Editors of the English Edition: Madeleine Goh & Chad Schroeder, under the auspices of the Center for Hellenic Studies, Washington D.C. Advisory Editors: Gregory Nagy & Leonard Muellner.
